page.title: 17POPULATION IN NE LEICS
page.content: The vast majority of the population of the Marefield/Lowesby area comprise the 18-65 age group (i.e. working population) and their children.The older people prefer to move out to villages where health and shopping facilities are available. Most families have been in the area for many years giving a mainly static population. A recent trend has been for professional families, often working in Leicester, to buy smallholdings to enjoy the rural way of life. The area is staunchly Conservative. Most families are content with their way of life expressing a sense of security and safety here and having no desire to live elsewhere. Thet consider the services provided by the Local Authority to be quite adequate in view of their remote position.
